subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The snapshot example demonstrates the use of the <schemacrawler> macro that comes bundled with SchemaCrawler.

ol.li: Install ant, and make sure that ant is on your path.
Copy the SchemaCrawler jar file and schemacrawler.config.properties into the snapshot example directory.
Start the hsqldb server by running runServer.cmd (runServer.sh on Unix) from the dbserver directory.
See the output produced in the snapshot.txt file.
Try modifying the schemacrawler.config.properties with regular expressions, logging, and so on.
Try using different SchemaCrawler commands. (For a complete list of SchemaCrawler commands, run java -jar <schemacrawler-jar>.)
Try defining a new database connection, using your favorite database and driver.
